ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Numbers on Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Heheheh I heard that last night from a good cleric ( Wow, you died fast )  I agreed.  While I was waiting for my rez, I saw I had eaten about a 900pt DD. I had
ygData.messageBody:
Heheheh I heard that last night from a good cleric ("Wow, you died fast") I
agreed. While I was waiting for my rez, I saw I had eaten about a 900pt DD.
I had around 1600 hp, was slightyl hurt when the fight started, and totaled
about 400 melee dam before the spell hit and I died. A caster mob in
chardok nailed me, anyone know what spell it was?


> The best clerics I group with understand that cheal is only mana-efficient
above a certain hit point
> range, which Bards rarely reach. They're also aware of the fact that we
have maybe 55% the hit points of
> a major tank. The bad ones don't. I don't like playing with the bad
ones. I always end up hearing "wow,
> you died fast". No kidding.
